extendedInfo.description: CASINO style slot machine gambling !   + FREE SLOTS + FREE COIN BONUSES + WIN COLLECTABLE MAGIC PETSHD Slots graphics, high quality soundtrack, new levels and developer updates promise to keep you on the edge of your seat as you travel in the best slots journey that can only be described as magic.  Features totally FREE gambling with coin and gold bonus refills, but with vegas city casino style gameplay, and big jackpots making this a great slots game.  And if you liked the fun animal icons of Slotomania check out the rare cute Magic Pets to be collected in Magic Slots, a feature unique amongst casino games.CHECK OUT PLAYER REVIEWS:"Cute game ! Keeps you playing ! Probably the only slot that gives you plenty of coins." â High payout casino slotsâ Vegas casino style slots gameplayâ Collectable cute MAGIC PETS with names and powersâ NEW Unlockable Levels with updates â High quality, high resolution artwork â Magical HQ music soundtrack â 3 reels with new icons every levelâ Frequent FREE COIN BONUSES to help you win! Magic Slots, also known as Pokies in Australia and Fruit Machine in the UK, has the above features.  We'll be bringing Facebook connectivity to play with your friends and compete for gold.  Many players have called this a "fun loose slots" because there are still many gold coin bonuses in solitaire mode where the best will become a slots millionaire.This newest video slot simulator in the mobile market is brought to you by HitGrab, Inc., an award-winning studio in the social gaming industry on Facebook and iOS that has given you such titles as MouseHunt, Magic Pets, and more!

reviews.title: Boring
